name: Based (Game Prototype)
description:
Download now to start your chaotic adventure! 

Play as the captured alien Zid. 

Fight your way out of the dangerous Area 52½

Activate Ragdoll on Zid by pressing 'F' on your keyboard ;)

Otherwise, standard controls - WASD to move, spacebar to jump, and left mouse button to fire.

(this is a prototype; check back later for updates!)

----

Hi! We are Rag n Bone, a team of students studying with the AIE.

This is a prototype of our game project which we will be working on for the rest of the year.  You can help us out enormously by playtesting it and filling out a feedback form, found here:  Playtest feedback 

Additionally, we have a pitch for what the game will be, beyond the prototype. That can be found here: Pitch feedback
